snippet: Gordie Howe will be back at the Pacific Coliseum, in Vancouver, British Columbia, on Friday for the annual Gordie Howe night.
abstract: Gordie Howe will be back at the Pacific Coliseum, in Vancouver, British Columbia, on Friday for the annual Gordie Howe night.
lead_paragraph: VANCOUVER, British Columbia -- Gordie Howe is only 80 days older than the cornerstone of Ron Toigo's business empire. First, Howe endorsed the Triple O burgers from the White Spot restaurant chain, which began in 1928, and then he bought into Toigo's Vancouver Giants, of the Western Hockey League, in 2001.

headline.main: In Vancouver, a Night for Gordie Howe
